news.title: Anthony Zurcher: Supreme Court decision broadens Trump's power
news.summary: It handed a significant victory to Donald Trump - and future American presidents.

news.title: We've got the right balance, says PM after benefits U-turn
news.summary: The prime minister has made concessions on his welfare bill after an angry response from 120 of his own MPs.

news.title: MI6 distances its new chief from Nazi grandfather
news.summary: Blaise Metreweli "neither knew nor met" her grandfather, reportedly a chief Nazi informant during World War Two.

news.title: Health alerts come into force ahead of second heatwave
news.summary: The UK could see its hottest day of the year on Monday, as a likely heatwave coincides with Glastonbury and Wimbledon.

news.title: Anna Wintour's legacy and who might replace her as Vogue editor
news.summary: Dame Anna announced this week she was stepping down as editor-in-chief after 37 years.

news.title: Son of Norway's crown princess suspected of rape, police say
news.summary: The 28-year-old, who does not have a royal title, has denied the three rape allegations.

news.title: Man who murdered boy with sword jailed for 38 years
news.summary: Daniel Anjorin had "a generous spirit that touched everyone who knew him" his family said.

news.title: A month into Gaza's new aid system - killings, gunfire and chaos are routine
news.summary: A month into the resumption of aid distribution in Gaza there have been repeated reports of killings, with a BBC Verify analysis of dozens of videos showing chaos and panic as people head to get aid.

news.title: DR Congo and Rwanda sign long-awaited peace deal in Washington
news.summary: The deal has been hailed by President Trump as "a great day" but there are potential pitfalls.

news.title: What are the Pip and universal credit changes?
news.summary: The planned changes to the benefits system will affect future claimants, not current claimants.
